name: Cosmos (No Moss Studios)
description:
COSMOS:

Most of the cosmos is defined by emptiness. Where it’s not empty there is a blend of chaos and beauty. Can two people come together to create something beautiful out of nothing? Or will it spiral into chaos?

THE CURRENT STATE OF THE GAME:

COSMOS is an experimental game to explore the feeling of long distance relationship. Currently we have put a hold on the project to explore different themes. 

FEEDBACK:

If you enjoyed Cosmos and would like to play more please feel free to reach out. We welcome all feedback so that we can shape the game towards a more enjoyable experience. Please feel free to reach out :)
